releases.body:
## What's Changed
* convert runtime type error to comptime by @JackDyre in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/11
* device deinit/free by @JackDyre in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/12
* add device to host memcpy by @JackDyre in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/10
* Add extra nvrtc args by @PaulBrushman in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/14
* Expose module and function from lib by @PaulBrushman in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/13

## New Contributors
* @JackDyre made their first contribution in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/11
* @PaulBrushman made their first contribution in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/14

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/compare/0.2.0...0.2.1

Compaitible with zig 0.14.0

## What's Changed
* Update zon and test target for zig 0.14 by @jackalcooper in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/8

## New Contributors
* @jackalcooper made their first contribution in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/8

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/compare/0.1.0...0.2.0

Compatible with zig 0.13.0

## What's Changed
* Fix `build.zig`. Make example depend on parent project. by @DanikVitek in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/2
* Fix segfault on Windows by @DanikVitek in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/4
* update for zig 14 by @Koeng101 in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/7

## New Contributors
* @DanikVitek made their first contribution in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/2
* @Koeng101 made their first contribution in https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/pull/7

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/akhildevelops/cudaz/commits/0.1.0
